page.title: 07EDUCATION IN MONIFIETH
page.content:
{ Lord Thomson of Monifieth}opened the {High School}in 1980,though pupils had classes there before that.Monifieth High has 4 main teaching blocks and a swimming pool.1100 students are there. Primary Schools: { Grange}opened in 1975.It has 17 rooms In 1985 6 classes and a special unit are in it.Groups use the FE Lounge day and evening. { Seaview}is 5 yrs older than Grange. Both were built to cope with birthrate bulge and population increase.Infants from Invertay once used the Annexe. { Invertay}100 years old in 1978 closes in June this year.We are sad to see it close but falling birthrates cause school rolls to drop.Pupils are going to Seaview.Invertay has been excellent
Teachers and parents on{Monifieth} {School Council}represent the 4 of them
